Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees face the Kansas City Royals for Game 3 of their three-game MLB series on Wednesday, September 11, 2024.
The game will not be on TV but can be watched with a free trial to Amazon Prime Video.
The Yankees have an 83-62 record overall and a 38-32 record at home.
The Royals have an 80-66 record overall and a 35-36 record on the road.
The Yankees lead the season series 4-2.
Aaron Judge has 51 home runs, 117 walks, and 126 RBI while hitting .320 for the Yankees.
Bobby Witt Jr. has a .334 batting average to lead the Royals, with 41 doubles, 11 triples, and 30 home runs.
